name: The Day Time stood still
description:
The weather is fucked up, and you are a survivor. Try to join the bunker at the end of the level. Beware the ennemies on your way and of the weather.

This weather is truly a wreck. Temperatures can now drop low enough for time itself to freeze…

Credit : Background music : https://pixabay.com/fr/music/optimiste-frozeth-116126/
